ComicInfo.Characters: Emil Grackleflint,Wally Ut,Man-Mountain of Dzoxk,Joe Phat,Kevin Matchstick,Kirby Hero
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:35:31 [Issue ID 4000-105884] urn:comicvine:4000-105884 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 15:59:31. [Issue ID 105884]
ComicInfo.Summary: Joe, Kevin, and Kirby find a group of Redcaps about to sacrifice someone. They defeat the Redcaps and rescue the victim: Wally Ut. The four of them continue on, with much argument about who's in charge, who's a mage, and what color magic is. Kevin basically refuses to accept anything that anyone else says. They finally arrive at an arena, where Emil and the Man-Mountain of Dzoxk are waiting for them.
ComicInfo.Title: Out Damned Spot!
ComicInfo.StoryArc: "Mage: The Hero Defined" The Hero Defined
